ctx: Potrjeno je: švedsko vlado bo vodila premierka Magdalena Andersson
content:
DOMOKRACIJA:
Anderssonovo je danes podprl 101 poslanec, 75 se jih je glasovanja
vzdržalo, 173 pa jih je bilo proti. Po švedskem sistemu kandidat za
predsednika vlade ne potrebuje večine glasov. Potrjen je, če proti
njemu ne glasuje večina. TO, je DIKRATURA.

Stevilo revnih pa raste....precej hitro
More pensioners closer to the poverty line - Radio Sweden
sverigesradio.se ›
artikel
4 Jun 2018 — Swedes with the lowest pensions are inching closer to
the poverty line, compared to just over a decade ago, a new report
from the Swedish ...

What percent of Sweden lives below the poverty line?
Relative poverty (low economic standard): In Sweden, 16.4% live in
relative poverty. During the period 2008–2018, the proportion
increased from just over 13 percent to just over 16 percent.

Something is rotten in the state of Sweden. That something is
housing — or, more accurately, the lack of it. The shortage is
leading to record home prices and a homebuilding boom as cheap
credit lures consumers, unable to find affordable rental
properties, into the housing market. Real house prices in Sweden
have risen by more than 200% since the mid-1990s, according to a
financial stability ...

Zadaj za socialisticno fasado je VEDNO grdo.
